about_the_game:
A Vorpal Knight with twisted ambitions has kidnapped the last Pixies to drain their power! Replace your weak starting party with stronger heroes, find useful items and game-changing relics, and assemble a formidable rescue team in this roguelike auto-battler, a love letter to the 8-bit games of yore.

Fairytale creatures have been hunted to near extinction and a mad-man has captured the last of the Pixies... well, almost!

Actually, one Pixie managed to make it away. I hear she's the cutest and smartest one of the whole bunch! Oh, actually, I have a picture of her right here!

What do you mean she doesn't match the graphics at all!? Rude! Alright, alright, that's not exactly what I... I mean SHE looks like, but I bet its a pretty accurate interpretation, y'know? Anyway, I'll let you get back to reading what the game is about. You're leaning towards buying it right?

Nurmi!

Fiiiiiiiine, I'm leaving! But make sure you make it sound good!

Ahem... travel across 5 different biomes including meadows, deserts, forests, graveyards, and volcanic plains.

Meet and recruit over 30 different heroes with unique fantasy classes. With only 4 slots in your party, you must decide who will take up that precious space. Physical attackers, spellcasters, healers, multi-target damage dealers, negative status slingers, buffers... you must decide what combination will lead you to victory.

Feel free to relax or even multitask! Pixel Pixie is an AUTO-BATTLER. Make strategic decisions related to your party composition and what upgrades to spend your money on. Once a battle starts, your team will take care of the rest!

Make strategic use of your hard-won items in between battles. Stocking enough goods could make the difference between a harrowing victory and a soul-crushing defeat.

Permanent progression! While every new attempt will have you start over with no recruits, items, or relics, you can unlock permanent upgrades using in-game currency to give your party a leg up! Systematically improve the quality of your starting party as well as the contents of your backpack and wallet with each new attempt.

5 progressively more challenging difficulty settings. Can you rescue the Pixies on the hardest difficulty setting?

DISCLAIMER: Please note that some promotional images and in-game static images have been created using the assistance of AI in combination with manual revisions. Thank you.

name: Pixel Pixie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: intel Core i5 Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL Capable Dedicated GPU (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: intel Core i5 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
